application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Discharge of conditions for approved permission 4425/21: Submission of material samples (Condition 3); Control of construction activity and traffic - details (Condition 4); Cycle Parking (Condition 5); Basement (Condition 10);Sustainable drainage measures/surface water run-off attenuation measures (Condition 11); Fire Safety (Condition 12) (Summary)
decision_conditions: in accordance with plans, Basement Impact Assessment (Ref BIA/12537, March 2022), Chemical Interpretive Letter Report (Ref CHEM/12537, Dated March 2022), Construction Logistics and Management Plan (CLMP), Factual Report (Ref FACT/12537, dated 13/01/2022), Site Drainage Assessment & Sustainable Drainage Systems (SuDS) (QFRA 2609, dated 25th February 2025), Appendix A (Collection of Figures), Appendix B (Geological Map of the Site), Appendix C (Existing Site and Proposed Plans), Appendix D (Topographic Map of the Site), Appendix E (Surface Water Flood Maps), Appendix F (Greenfield Runoff Rate Estimation), Appendix G (Sewer Asset Map Data), Appendix H (Rainfall Runoff Summary), Appendix I (Outline SuDS Plan), Appendix J (Attenuation Modelling Output Summary), Appendix K (Exceedance Flow Routes), Rainwater Product Guide
